strings.Value: "My spells must be replenished. I feel uncomfortable without them."
"It was a hard day. My spells must be restored, so we're prepared for tomorrow."
"At least you can always rely on your weapons if magic fails you… If the same thing happens to me, all I can do is hide behind my companions!"
"You'd better sharpen your blade, instead of wasting time on that crap!"
"You're rather well-stocked — your weapons, your magic, and your wolf. It's no wonder you sometimes forget to replenish your spells."
"Oh, oh, can I play with wolfy while you're busy? He's so sweet — such a fluffy head, and that soft fur! I just love it when you summon him!"
